lead_paragraph: Artists and patrons like Cindy Sherman and Laurie Simmons spend an evening exploring the museum’s new home.

headline.print_headline: Artists for Art’s Sake at the Whitney
headline.main: Whitney Inaugurates New Museum with Dinner

snippet: Artists and patrons like Cindy Sherman and Laurie Simmons spend an evening exploring the museum’s new home.
abstract: Whitney Museum of American Art hosts inaugural dinner, allowing guests to explore new nine-floor museum designed by architect Renzo Piano.
